COL 1.24 nu fagino in þaimei winna faur izwis jah usfullja gaidwa aglono Xristaus in leika meinamma faur leik is, þatei ist aikklesjo, COL 1.25 þizozei warþ ik andbahts bi ragina gudis, þatei giban ist mis in izwis du usfulljan waurd gudis, COL 1.26 runa sei gafulgina was fram aiwam jah fram aldim, iþ nu gaswikunþida warþ þaim weiham is, COL 1.27 þaimei wilda guþ gakannjan gabein wulþaus þizos runos in þiudom, þatei ist Xristus in izwis, wens wulþaus, COL 1.28 þanei weis gateiham talzjandans all manne jah laisjandans all manne in allai handugein, ei atsatjaima all manne fullawitan in Xristau Iesu, COL 1.29 du þammei arbaidja usdaudjands bi waurstwa sei inna uswaurkeiþ in mis in mahtai...
...COL 2.11 frawaurhte leikis, in bimaita Xristaus, COL 2.12 miþ ganawistrodai imma in daupeinai, in þizaiei jah miþurrisuþ þairh galaubein waurstwis gudis, saei urraisida ina us dauþaim.

COL 2.13 jah izwis dauþans wisandans missadedim jah unbimaita leikis izwaris miþgaqiwida miþ imma, fragibands uns allos missadedins, COL 2.14 afswairbands þos ana uns wadjabokos raginam seinaim, þatei was andaneiþo uns, jah þata usnam us midumai ganagljands ita du galgin,
COL 2.15 andhamonds sik leika, reikja jah waldufnja gatarhida balþaba, gablauþjands þo bairhtaba in sis.
COL 2.16 ni manna nu izwis bidomjai in mata aiþþau in draggka aiþþau in dailai dagis dulþais aiþþau fulliþe aiþþau sabbatum, COL 2.17 þatei ist skadus þize anawairþane,

COL 2.18 ni ƕashun izwis gajiukai, wiljands in hauneinai jah blotinassau aggile þatei ni saƕ ushafjands sik, sware ufblesans fram fraþja leikis seinis, COL 2.19 jah ni habands haubiþ, us þammei all leik þairh gawissins jah gabindos auknando jah þeihando wahseiþ du wahstau gudis.
...COL 2.20 þis fairƕaus, ƕa þanaseiþs swe qiwai in þamma fairƕau urrediþ?
COL 2.21 ni teikais, nih atsnarpjais, nih kausjais!

COL 2.22 þatei ist all du riurein, þairh þatei is brukjaidau bi anabusnim jah laiseinim manne, COL 2.23 þoei sind sweþauh waurd habandona handugeins in fastubnja jah hauneinai hairtins jah unfreideinai leikis, ni in sweriþo ƕizai du soþa leikis.
COL 3.1 Jabai nu miþurrisuþ Xristau, þoei iupa sind sokeiþ, þarei Xristus ist in taihswai gudis sitands.
COL 3.2 þaimei iupa sind fraþjaiþ, ni þaim þoei ana airþai sind.
COL 3.3 unte gadauþnodeduþ jah libains izwara gafulgina ist miþ Xristau in guda.
COL 3.4 þan Xristus swikunþs wairþiþ, libains izwara, þanuh jah jus bairhtai wairþiþ miþ imma in wulþau.
COL 3.5 dauþeiþ nu liþuns izwarans, þans þaiei sind ana airþai, horinassau, unhrainein, winna, lustau ubilana jah faihugeiron, soei ist galiugagude skalkinassus;
COL 3.6 þairh þoei qimiþ hatis gudis ana sunum ungalaubeinais,
COL 3.7 in þaimei jah jus iddjeduþ simle, þan libaideduþ in þaim.
COL 3.8 iþ nu aflagjiþ jah jus þo alla, hatis, þwairhein, unselein, anaqiss, aglaitiwaurdein;
COL 3.9 ni liugaiþ izwis misso, afslaupjandans izwis þana fairnjan mannan miþ tojam is, COL 3.10 jah gahamoþ niujamma, þamma ananiwidin du ufkunþja bi frisahtai þis, saei gaskop ina;
COL 3.11 þarei nist Kreks jah Judaius, bimait jah faurafilli, barbarus jah Skwþus, skalks jah freis, ak alla jah in allaim Xristus.

COL 3.12 gahamoþ izwis nu swe gawalidai gudis, weihans jah walisans, brusts bleiþeins, , selein, haunein ahins, qairrein, usbeisnein. COL 3.13 þulandans izwis misso jah fragibandans silbans, jabai ƕas wiþra ƕana habai fairina;
swaswe jah Xristus fragaf izwis, swa jah jus taujaiþ.
COL 3.14 aþþan ufar alla þo friaþwa, sei ist gabindi ainamundiþos.
